2.12: ninb Bua kwavg zyruq, ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb, tovb txb ninb Bua yem i-yipq Zwrtq taaib uaq taub. ninb Bua mivb kan Eiag Eei zyenb, tovb yem weib kxmj ninb Bua uaq teij myenb Eei zyenb. ninb Bua yaag paaij uaq teij zyenb zyrug Zua'q zyruq Qiaj Jiad haig.
2.15: ninb Bua haiq zang Zwrtq mivb Bx'q Jaaj, zyruq Eei puad zatq Jyenq pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq, Navq zyruq Zauj ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag yaag Navq zyruq hruq Jyenq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua nx. ninb Bua za'kevb zu'g Kruq a'q.
2.13: ninb Bua kwavg zyruq, mivb fub suj Baa-an zyenb Zauj atg-Taa-lotq zyenb.
2.1: zyruq Eei finb myenb yem kin-kaan mivb Tauj Bo-Kim. ninb kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, “yia txb meib Bua yem i-yipq Zwrtq taaib, yaag txb meib Bua pia'g tovb yia Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij hruq Jyenq lcvd Eei teib puv. yia kxvq, ‘yia zuvq maiq kwavg tovb yia Zauj meib Bua lyepg Jiaj Eei vcvg waag.

6.18: Toq meib maiq tuvq kcvb mivb haaij. zuaq yia cvj taaib lxd meib cvj txb yia fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq taaib an meib Eei Ra'Myen.”   zyruq Eei finb myenb kxvq, “yia lcvd yem naaiq zuaq meib taaib Tauj.”
6.8: zyruq zyrug Paaiq taub trug waag myenb taaib lxd i-saa-laa-en myenb. trug waag myenb kxvq, “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia txb meib Bua yem i-yipq, tovb meib Bua zu'g zruj nrub Eei teib puv, Zwrtq taaib.
6.33: uaq zang mi-Dyen myenb Zauj aa-maa-lekq myenb yetg zuvq Zauj tov puv Eei myenb kapq zunq Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib, lyepg Zyavq yem yitq-le-en hxvd.
6.3: i-saa-laa-en myenb haiq zang zwavj ka'naaiq, mi-Dyen myenb Zauj aa-maa-lekq myenb Zauj yem tov puv Eei myenb Zaavq pia'g taaib Bx'q ninb Bua.
6.32: weig naaiq, uaq Nxi ninb Bua Tevj ki-De-on Zwrtq Buaj heug ye-lupq-Baa-an, eij leid se, “pun Baa-an weig ninb kanb Rcv,” weig zu'g ki-De-on Zc'q Baa-an Eei ziab txvb.
6.21: zyruq Eei finb myenb zyrug lovg tovb ninb nanq Jyenq uaq tiub pyaaq Eei tweib mweid Zo'q zu'g uaq teij xq Zauj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq, zyrug maaib trud yem uaq la'pyeiq Fopg Zwrtq taaib puaq uaq teij xq Zauj Fuaq Qwi Revg. zyav naaig maiq pwatg zyruq Eei finb myenb mig a'q.
6.35: ninb Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb kxmj maa-natq-sej, heug ninb Bua taaib kan ninb mivb. ninb cvj pun myenb mivb Buaj aa-se myenb, sej-Bu-lun myenb Zauj napq-Taa-li myenb. uaq teij yaag taaib Zauj ki-De-on Bua kapq Jyenq txig.
6.40: uaq mwrnd Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx zruj. Kuvj pa'ki yuvb pyei Bxvj Gaai Eei, mq paag Wiv kxmj Eei Dau Byuvb swiq Pinj Dxn Revg.
6.14: zyruq Win Rwrnj taaib mavg ki-De-on cvj kxvq Buaj ninb, “xij zu'g lovg meib maaib Eei Qa'q mivb Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb pyauj Dutq mi-Dyen myenb Eei puab Diaq. yia Paaiq meib mivb maiq zeid?”
6.23: mq paag zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, “pcvb xn a'q og. maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. meib maiq zu'g taig.”
6.6: i-saa-laa-en myenb laaij mi-Dyen myenb zruj Eei Jauq Jomg tu'q Kruq haig. ninb Bua zyrug heug Jyenq Toq zyruq Tevj.
6.34: zyruq Eei sivj livb zyrug Fiag taaib yem ki-De-on. ki-De-on zyrug pyomq Jxv heug aa-Bi-ye-se myenb taaib zunq kan ninb mivb.
6.2: mi-Dyen myenb kaub henq i-saa-laa-en myenb. laaij mi-Dyen myenb zeij i-saa-laa-en myenb, i-saa-laa-en myenb yem Bov zruj txvj pivj. ninb Bua yem Bcvb vaamb, Bcvb Kwrtq yaag zruj weib wrnq Eei txvj.
6.36: ki-De-on kxvq Buaj Tinb huvb, “sij kxvq meib lovg yia Eei puad Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Navq meib kxvq nx,
6.20: Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb kxvq Buaj ninb, “zx'q xq Zauj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq taaib an Jyenq naaiq nxm la'pyeiq kub vwaaig. zx'q xb Txv toj Jyenq.” ki-De-on zyrug ei Jyenq zruj.
6.24: ki-De-on zyrug yem uaq weig zyruq Zeij nxm ziab txvb yaag Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj Eei Buaj heug, “zyruq se pcvb xn.” uaq nxm ziab txvb Zxg yem aa-Bi-ye-se myenb Eei o-faa-laa zivb Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
6.28: ta'Eeig Dxm, uaq nxm zivb Eei myenb Jiad sin taaib Ryruq Eei, pwatg Baa-an Eei ziab txvb zu'g Zc'q Fiag. ziab txvb ka'Len Eei aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj yaag zu'g kxij Revg. maaib ta'Eeig uaq taub vovb kruq yem syavb Zeij taaib Eei ziab txvb kub vwaaig ziag Jyenq a'q.
6.7: i-saa-laa-en myenb laaij mi-Dyen myenb Toq zyruq Tevj uaq zang,
6.29: ninb Bua zyrug laanb naaig laanb, “naaiq haiq taub zruj?” ninb Bua zaab naaig zyrug zaab Zwrtq taaib kxvq, “yo-aatg Eei txn, ki-De-on, zruj.”
6.19: ki-De-on zyrug Rwrnj pyauq mivb liug leid taub yuvb txn, yaag lovg yetg Tovq Bwrnq zruj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq. ninb zx'q yuvb xq an Jyenq Jei, xb Txv tapq Jyenq Zcv zyrug txb mivb yem Ba'ov zwei Dyavj ka'Diaq an Jyenq, fovg hxg pun zyruq Eei finb myenb.
6.17: ki-De-on tau ninb, “sij kxvq yia hxpg meib Eei Hruq nx, Toq pun yia pwatg nxm Javb hog, yia zyrug hiuq tu'q se tovb zyruq Zauj yia kxvq waag.
6.38: yaag za'kevb Navq uaq nx. ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei, ki-De-on zx'q pa'ki yuvb pyei taaib nanq, nanq tu'q yetg Rxmg Byuvb swiq.
6.31: mq paag yo-aatg tau taaib koj ninb Eei txn uaq teij myenb, “meib Bua xij Tevj Baa-an Rcv fai? xij zruj sig tiq ninb fai? haiq taub Tevj Baa-an Rcv nx, maiq kcvb Tauj luvb Dxm, uaq taub zuvq zu'g taij taig. sij kxvq Baa-an za'kevb zruj zyenb nx, maaib myenb Zc'q ninb Eei ziab txvb, sweib ninb weig ninb kanb Rcv.”
6.30: zivb Eei myenb txij yo-aatg kxvq, “zx'q meib Eei txn Zwrtq taaib pun yia Bua taij a'q, weig zu'g ninb Zc'q Baa-an Eei ziab txvb yaag kxij ziab txvb ka'Len Eei aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj.”
6.27: ki-De-on zyrug txb zyepg taub ninb Eei pru ei zyruq Buaj Eei waag zruj. luvb Nxi zang ninb maiq kaamq zruj, weig zu'g ninb kamb Riaj pyauq zov myenb Zauj uaq nxm zivb Eei myenb. ninb zyrug luvb mwrnd zang zruj.
6.11: Ga'haaq zyruq Eei finb myenb mivb o-faa-laa laavd, zweid Jyenq aa-Bi-ye-se Eei zeib fun, yo-aatg Eei Ba'ov zwei Dyavj ka'Diaq. uaq zang yo-aatg Eei txn, ki-De-on, yem Eweib a'vung pyruq Eei zxvb Bx'q Byaub witq weig pivj, maiq pun mi-Dyen myenb pwatg.
6.5: naaiq teij myenb txb Jyenq scvb Kuq Zauj Dopg liub taaib Navq yetg kwanb yetg kwanb Jopg Eeig nx. myenb Zauj lxb Txb Zamq! haig, zuvq saauq maiq zyend. ninb Bua pia'g taaib Navq naaiq nx zruj waaig teib puv.
6.9: yia Fruj meib Bua pyauj Dutq i-yipq myenb Eei puab Diaq Zauj zeij meib Bua yetg zuvq myenb Eei puab Diaq. yia zung ninb Bua yem meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj Zwrtq naaiq nxm teib puv, yaag zx'q ninb Bua Eei teib puv Jiu pun meib Bua.
6.16: zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia zuvq xij Zauj meib yem. meib zyrug Bx'q hivb mi-Dyen myenb Dovg Bx'q Du'g laanb myenb Navq.”
6.37: uaq Euvg yia zx'q pa'ki yuvb pyei an Jyenq Bx'q Byaub Zyavq. sij kxvq Kuvj pun Byuvb swiq Pinj pa'ki yuvb pyei Dxn Navq, Wivb kxmj pa'ki yuvb pyei ka'Len Eei Dau Gaai, yia zyrug hiuq tu'q meib za'kevb xij lovg yia Eei puad Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Navq meib kxvq nx.”
6.39: ki-De-on zyrug kxvq Buaj Tinb huvb, “Toq maiq tuvq Qiaj Jiad yia, cvj pun yia seij yetg Rung Navq. Toq pun yia lovg naaiq teij pa'ki yuvb pyei cvj seij Rung. naaiq Rung Toq pun pa'ki yuvb pyei Gaai, mq paag Wiv kxmj ka'Len pun Byuvb swiq Pinj Dxn Revg.”
6.4: uaq teij myenb lyepg Zyavq uaq Deig zyrug zruj waaig kcvb zwavj mivb Tauj kaa-saa zivb. ninb Bua maiq lyrub yetg Euvg pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Eang. pa'ki yuvb, vovb Zauj lxb zuvq maiq lyrub a'q.
6.10: yia kxvq Buaj meib Bua, “yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb. meib Bua yem Jyenq aa-mo-lai myenb Eei teib puv maiq tuvq zavg ninb Bua Eei zyenb.” mq paag meib Bua maiq mwavj yia Eei waag.’+”
6.22: ki-De-on zia'q tu'q za'kevb penj zyruq Eei finb myenb, ninb zyrug kxvq, “o zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! Kruq a'q lo'b! yia Myen txij Myen tu'q pwatg liud zyruq Eei finb myenb mig a'q.”
6.12: zyruq Eei finb myenb hing Zwrtq taaib pun ki-De-on pwatg uaq zang, finb myenb kxvq, “taamq Lo Eei Junb zeiq myenb aa'b! zyruq Zauj meib yem.”
6.15: ki-De-on kxvq Buaj ninb, “zyruq aag, yia Navq haiq nx haib Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb? yem maa-natq-sej fivj yia Eei tia Eei trub zov se kaub faij Jiaj. yem yia Eei pyauq zov myenb, yia zruj faij Jiaj uaq taub.”
6.13: ki-De-on tau ninb, “tomb kxj aag, sij kxvq zyruq Zauj yia Bua yem, yia Bua weig haiq tiug pwavb zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig? yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij kxvq Buaj yia Bua, ‘zyruq txb yia Bua yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq taaib.’ uaq Euvg ninb zruj uaq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Jiaj haaij mig a'q? ib zang zyruq kwavg yia Bua, pun yia Bua zu'g yem mi-Dyen myenb Eei puab Diaq.”
6.1: ziuj zyruq mavg, i-saa-laa-en myenb cvj zruj waaig sig. zyruq zyrug zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem mi-Dyen myenb Eei puab Diaq siag Havj.
6.26: meib xij zu'g yem naaiq nxm wrnq Eei txvj kub vwaaig weig zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, lovg la'pyeiq Zeij nxm ziab txvb suv Eei, yaag lovg meib kxij taaib Eei aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj zruj zaavb. zx'q uaq taub ta'Eeig taub vovb kruq zruj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq.”
6.25: tovb naaig mwrnd zyruq kxvq Buaj ki-De-on, “zx'q meib Eei tia Eei ta'Eeig uaq taub vovb kruq, tovb tu'q siag Havj uaq taub. xij zu'g Zc'q Revg meib Eei tia weig Baa-an zyenb Zeij Eei ziab txvb, yaag kxij ziab txvb ka'Len Eei aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj.

13.18: zyruq Eei finb myenb kxvq Buaj maa-no-aa, “meib zruj haiq Euvg naaig yia Eei Buaj? yia Eei Buaj se Bua'g hxvb Eei Buaj.”
13.8: maa-no-aa zyrug tauj kauj Toq zyruq, “zyruq aa'b! Toq meib cvj Paaiq Rung Tinb huvb Eei myenb taaib hing Zwrtq pun yia Bua i Mwavq pwatg, yaag Faauj yia Bua hiuq tu'q, uaq taub txn Zwrtq seij taaib, yia Bua hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx txb ninb.”
13.3: zyruq Eei finb myenb hing Zwrtq taaib Buaj naaiq taub auq, “meib mtaaib maiq haib maaib kub vwaad, yaag maiq haib maaib scvb yuvd. mq paag meib zuvq xij maaib nxm sin, yuvd tu'q taub txn.
13.21: yem naaig taaib zyruq Eei finb myenb maiq hing Zwrtq pun maa-no-aa Zauj ninb Eei auq pwatg a'q. maa-no-aa zyrug hiuq tu'q uaq taub myenb se zyruq Eei finb myenb.
13.14: maiq tuvq pun ninb Eang yem a'vung Mei tu'q taaib Eei haiq Euvg. maiq tuvq hopq a'vung tiuq fai haiq Euvg tiuq. maiq tuvq Eang maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq. yia hatg Eei haiq Euvg waag ninb xij zu'g ei Jyenq zruj Revg.”
13.23: mq paag ninb Eei auq kxvq Buaj ninb, “sij kxvq zyruq xij taij Bua nx, ninb maiq zipq Bua puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g. ninb maiq hing naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig pun Bua. ib zang yaag maiq kxvq naaiq teij waag Buaj Bua.”
13.6: naaiq taub msia'q txn zyrug mivb kxvq Buaj ninb Eei Goj, “maaib taub Tinb huvb Eei myenb taaib lxd yia. ninb Eei Myenb mweig Navq Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb nx. yia haid kevb kamb Riaj Eei. yia maiq tu'q naaig ninb yem haaij taaib. ninb yaag maiq Buaj yia ninb Eei Buaj heug haiq Euvg.
13.2: uaq zang maaib taub Daan fivj Eei myenb, Buaj heug maa-no-aa, yem soj-laa zivb. ninb Eei auq maiq haib maaib kub vwaad.
13.20: ninb Bua i Mwavq mavg Jyenq uaq zang pwatg trub Byetg yem ziab txvb Yaavj faauj luvb. zyruq Eei finb myenb yem ziab txvb Eei trub Byetg ka'Euad faauj luvb mig a'q. maa-no-aa Zauj ninb Eei auq pwatg zyrug Pua'q Fiag Dau mivb.
13.24: Ga'haaq uaq taub msia'q txn yuvd tu'q taub txn zyrug Zwrtq Buaj heug scm-sanj. uaq taub txn Lo Jyenq faauj, zyruq yaag Zeij fu'q pun ninb.
13.7: mq paag ninb kxvq Buaj yia, ‘meib xij maaib nxm sin, yuvd tu'q taub txn. Navq naaig meib maiq tuvq hopq a'vung tiuq fai haiq Euvg tiuq yaag maiq tuvq Eang maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq, weig zu'g naaiq taub txn Zwrtq seij taaib Tauj taig, ninb xij zu'g kwei Tinb huvb zruj naa-sij myenb.’+”
13.19: maa-no-aa zyrug zx'q taub yuvb txn Zauj Jyenq fovg hxg ziag Eei laavb zi'g taaib an Jyenq ziab txvb, la'pyeiq kub vwaaig, fovg hxg pun zyruq, se zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig uaq taub. maa-no-aa Zauj ninb Eei auq mavg Jyenq.
13.17: maa-no-aa naaig zyruq Eei finb myenb, “meib Eei Buaj heug haiq Euvg Toq Buaj yia, weig zu'g meib kxvq Eei waag Zwrtq taaib zyen Eei zyavb hog, yia Bua xij Taaib meib.”
13.11: maa-no-aa zyrug Jiad sin kan Jyenq ninb Eei auq mivb Tauj uaq taub myenb Eei Ra'Myen naaig ninb, “meib tovb zinb Daavg Zauj naaiq taub msia'q txn kxvq waag uaq taub fai?” uaq taub tau, “zeid Eei. yia se tovb uaq taub a'q.”
13.5: weig zu'g meib xij maaib nxm sin, xij yuvd tu'q taub txn. yetg liud maiq tuvq Teij ninb Eei mGxvq, weig zu'g naaiq taub txn Zwrtq seij taaib kwei Tinb huvb zruj naa-sij myenb. ninb xij Jiad kxn Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb pyauj Dutq fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei puab Diaq.”
13.9: Tinb huvb mwavj haid maa-no-aa tauj kauj Eei waag. uaq taub msia'q txn zweid uaq Deig ka'Euad Eei zyavb hog, Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb cvj taaib lxd ninb mq paag ninb Eei Goj, maa-no-aa, maiq Zauj ninb yem.
13.16: zyruq Eei finb myenb kxvq Buaj maa-no-aa, “maiq kunq meib heug yia zuaq, yia yaag maiq Eang meib Eei ka'naaiq. mq paag sij kxvq meib liug leid puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq, kunq fovg hxg pun zyruq.” (weig zu'g maa-no-aa maiq hiuq tu'q uaq taub myenb penj zyruq Eei finb myenb.)
13.4: weig naaiq xij zu'g faij fim. meib xij zu'g keg maiq tuvq hopq a'vung tiuq fai haiq Euvg tiuq, yaag maiq tuvq Eang maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq,
13.10: uaq taub msia'q txn syepg syepq Eei Tiuj mivb Buaj ninb Eei Goj, “tovb uaq Nxi taaib lxd yia uaq taub myenb cvj hing Zwrtq pun yia pwatg.”
13.22: maa-no-aa kxvq Buaj ninb Eei auq, “Bua Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g taig weig zu'g Bua tu'q pwatg liud Tinb huvb.”
13.12: maa-no-aa zyrug kxvq, “naaiq teij sig za'kevb Zwrtq taaib zyen Navq meib kxvq Eei waag, uaq taub txn Eei mcvg xij Navq haiq nx? Ga'haaq hivq ninb xij zu'g zruj haiq Euvg?”
13.15: maa-no-aa kxvq Buaj zyruq Eei finb myenb, “Toq meib maiq tuvq kcvb mivb. yia Bua xij Beng taub yuvb txn txb taaib pun meib.”
13.13: zyruq Eei finb myenb kxvq Buaj maa-no-aa, “yia Buaj naaiq taub msia'q txn Eei yetg zuvq waag ninb xij zu'g Buvb lovj.
13.1: ziuj zyruq mavg, i-saa-laa-en myenb cvj zruj waaig sig. zyruq zyrug zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei puab Diaq feij zyepg Havj.
13.25: ninb yem maa-haa-ne-Daan, soj-laa zivb Zauj etg-Taa-on zivb Bu'Dovj uaq zang, zyruq Eei sivj livb yem ninb Jiad kxn txb ninb zruj kov.

12.3: yia pwatg meib Bua maiq taaib Tevj yia. yia zyrug maiq lovg mcvg Eei Jiaj mivb Zauj am-mon myenb Bx'q Jaaj. zyruq yaag zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem yia Eei puab Diaq. ib Nxi meib Bua weig haiq tiug taaib yia naaiq xij Zauj yia Bx'q Jaaj?”
12.8: yepq-Taa kwei seij liud, Ga'haaq maaib Betg-le-hem muvq Eei myenb, ipg-saan, zruj tomb Jyen txb i-saa-laa-en myenb.
12.9: ninb maaib faab zyepg taub txn yaag maaib faab zyepg taub sia'q. sia'q ninb puvj Zwrtq pun kanb fivj myenb lovg. ninb yaag kxvq faab zyepg taub kanb fivj myenb Eei sia'q taaib zruj Bwavd. ninb zruj tomb Jyen txb i-saa-laa-en myenb siag Havj.
12.7: yepq-Taa zruj tomb Jyen txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Ju'q Havj zyrug kwei seij, zavj Jyenq ki-le-aatg teib puv Eei zivb.
12.5: ki-le-aatg myenb zyrug mivb Zaavq tu'q Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei ziaj nxm Jaub prug yaag tavq Jyenq maiq pun e-faa-im myenb Jiaj. haiq taub e-faa-im myenb pyauj Tauj uaq kxvq, “Toq pun yia Jiaj mivb,” ki-le-aatg myenb zyrug naaig, “meib se e-faa-im myenb zeid fai maiq zeid?” sij kxvq ninb kxvq, “maiq zeid,”
12.14: ninb maaib feij zyepg taub txn, faab zyepg taub txnb fun, keb Zyetq zyepg taub lxb. apg-Don zruj tomb Jyen txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Yetg Havj.
12.4: yepq-Taa zyrug heug ki-le-aatg teig Eei zwavj myenb taaib zunq Zauj e-faa-im myenb Bx'q Jaaj. ki-le-aatg myenb taij e-faa-im myenb, weig zu'g e-faa-im myenb kxvq “meib Bua ki-le-aatg myenb, se pyauj Zwrtq e-faa-im myenb Eei myenb yaag yem e-faa-im myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej myenb Eei Bu'Dovj.”
12.2: yepq-Taa zyrug tau ninb Bua, “yia Zauj yia Eei pc'g fivj Zauj am-mon myenb Bx'q Jyenq tomb Jaaj uaq zang, maiq kunq yia heug meib Bua, meib Bua yaag maiq taaib Fruj yia pyauj Dutq ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq.
12.6: ninb Bua Buaj ninb, “Navq naaig kxvq kaaj naaiq Jruj waag, ‘Qipq-Bo-letq.’+” uaq taub zyrug kxvq, “sipg-Bo-letq.” weig zu'g naaiq Jruj waag e-faa-im myenb kxvq maiq Junb. ninb Bua zyrug yem Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei Jaub prug zx'q ninb taij kwavg. uaq teij zyavb hog e-faa-im myenb zu'g taij taig pyei waang i Zin taub.
12.13: e-lon kwei seij liud, Ga'haaq pi-laa-Ton myenb, hin-len Eei txn, apg-Don, zruj tomb Jyen txb i-saa-laa-en myenb.
12.12: sej-Bu-lun myenb, e-lon, zyrug kwei seij, zavj Jyenq sej-Bu-lun myenb Eei teib puv, ai-yaa-lon zivb.
12.15: pi-laa-Ton myenb, hin-len Eei txn, apg-Don, kwei seij, zavj Jyenq e-faa-im teig, aa-maa-lekq myenb Eei Bovb aiq txvj, pi-laa-Ton zivb.
12.11: ipg-saan kwei seij liud, Ga'haaq maaib sej-Bu-lun myenb, e-lon, zruj tomb Jyen txb i-saa-laa-en myenb zyepg Havj.
12.1: e-faa-im myenb liug leid Bx'q Jaaj. ninb Bua Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib mivb Tauj saaj-fon, txij yepq-Taa kxvq, “meib weig haiq tiug Jiaj mivb Bx'q am-mon myenb yaag maiq heug yia Bua Zauj Jyenq meib mivb? yia Bua xij lovg trud puaq meib Eei pyauq, lyemb meib puaq.”
12.10: ipg-saan zyrug kwei seij mig a'q, zavj Jyenq Betg-le-hem muvq.

15.18: scm-sanj haid Jaav za'kevb Gaatq haig, zyrug heug Jyenq Toq zyruq. ninb kxvq “zyruq aa'b! meib lovg meib Eei pru Eei puad zruj Lo Eei sig Bx'q hivb winb wavq. ib zang yia xij zu'g Jaav Gaatq taig zyrug Dxtq Fiag maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei myenb Eei puab Diaq fai?”
15.3: scm-sanj kxvq, “naaiq Rung yia za'kevb xij zruj pun fi-li-saa-tia myenb. ninb Bua maiq lamb kwaij txvj a'q.”
15.8: scm-sanj Va'q tu'q uaq teij myenb to'g haig yaag taij taig Zamq Eei. ninb zyrug mivb yem uaq e-taam Eei Bcvb Kwrtq.
15.19: Tinb huvb zyrug pun yem le-hi yetg nxm Fovd Eei txvj Baaij, uam pctq Zwrtq taaib. scm-sanj hopq liud uam, ninb Eei Hruq zyrug fivq Jiad taaib haid Kub yem Revg. weig naaiq, uaq nxm txvj myenb Zwrtq Buaj heug en-hakg-Ko. uaq uamb zivq Zxg yem le-hi Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
15.9: fi-li-saa-tia myenb zyrug mivb lyepg Zyavq yem yu-Daa teig zyrug Raanj mivb Bx'q hivb le-hi zivb.
15.7: scm-sanj zyrug kxvq Buaj uaq teij fi-li-saa-tia myenb, “meib Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj, yia hruq Jyenq waag, yia zuvq xij Jaauq win pun meib Bua liud Zivj taaib kwavg.”
15.5: ninb yaag tyemq zia'g uaq teij trub paaq, zyrug puvj Yiab Juq Tiuj pia'g fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei Deig mivb. uaq zang fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei Byaub witq Zxg zyavb Jyenq Eei. trud zyrug puaq Revg zyavb Jyenq Eei Zauj kaatq taaib Eei Byaub zeiq Zauj ka'lanq pyruq Eei Deig.
15.16: scm-sanj kxvq, “yia lovg lxb Eei haab paab Buvq taij myenb taig Dwib Dwi Eei. yia lovg lxb Eei haab paab Buvq taij yetg Zin taub myenb.”
15.20: txij fi-li-saa-tia myenb kunq teib puv Eei zyavb hog. scm-sanj zruj tomb Jyen kunq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eig zyepg Havj.
15.17: kxvq liud naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug kwcvj lxb Eei haab paab Buvq kwavg mig a'q. uaq nxm txvj myenb zyrug Zwrtq Buaj heug laa-maatq-le-hi.
15.14: scm-sanj Tauj fatq teij le-hi zivb uaq zang, fi-li-saa-tia myenb Byrub Byrub Eei naug, huvj Jyenq ninb taaib. zyruq Eei sivj livb pun scm-sanj maaib Qa'q henq. Dob Jyenq ninb Eei puad Eei Laav zyrug Navq trud puaq Eei la'maab Laav nx, tavj Dutq Revg mig a'q.
15.4: scm-sanj zyrug mivb Zaa tu'q faamb pc'q taub Yiab Juq taaib, zx'q tweiq px'q Jyenq yetg txij yetg txij Eei, yaag zx'q trub paaq Eatq Jyenq txib txij Yiab Juq Eei tweiq Bu'Dovj.
15.2: ninb Eei ovb taa kxvq, “yia Namq taaib meib za'kevb! Rxv yia naaiq taub sia'q, yia zyrug puvj ninb Jiu pun meib Eei txig mig a'q. ninb Eei Riad kaub Rweig ninb maiq zeid? lovg ninb Eei Riad tiq ninb Eei txg maa'b!”
15.6: fi-li-saa-tia myenb zyrug naaig, “haiq taub Navq naaiq nx zruj?” ninb Bua tau, “Tim-naa-haa myenb Eei laavb, scm-sanj, zruj, weig zu'g ninb Eei ovb taa zx'q scm-sanj Eei auq Jiu pun scm-sanj Eei txig mig a'q.” fi-li-saa-tia myenb zyrug lovg trud puaq scm-sanj Eei auq Zauj ninb Eei ovb taa taig Revg.
15.13: ninb Bua tau scm-sanj, “yia Bua maiq hxig meib. yia Bua xij Dob Jyenq meib txb mivb Jiu pun fi-li-saa-tia myenb Navq. yia Bua lcvd maiq taij meib.” ninb Bua zyrug zx'q i tiub syavb Laav taaib Dob Jyenq scm-sanj, txb ninb yem Bcvb Kwrtq Zwrtq taaib.
15.12: uaq teij myenb kxvq Buaj scm-sanj, “yia Bua taaib Dob meib, xij zx'q meib Jiu pun fi-li-saa-tia myenb.” scm-sanj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua xij zu'g hruq Jyenq lcvd meib Bua kanb maiq taij yia.”
15.15: ninb pwatg maaib nxm maiq kcvb Gaai Eei lxb haab paab Buvq, zyrug Byenb puad zx'q taaib Bx'q taig yetg Zin taub fi-li-saa-tia myenb.
15.11: maaib pua Zin taub yu-Daa myenb, mivb e-taam Bcvb Kwrtq kxvq Buaj scm-sanj, “meib maiq hiuq fai? fi-li-saa-tia myenb kunq Jyenq yia Bua. meib Navq haiq nx zruj pun yia Bua?” scm-sanj tau, “ninb Bua Navq haiq nx zruj pun yia, yia zyrug Navq uaq nx zruj pun ninb Bua.”
15.1: Jiaj liud yetg Zaamj, Tauj kaatq Byaub witq Eei zyavb hog, scm-sanj txb taub yuvb txn mivb lxd ninb Eei auq. ninb kxvq, “yia xij pia'g ken mivb lxd yia Eei msia'q txn.” mq paag ninb Eei ovb taa maiq pun ninb pia'g.
15.10: yu-Daa myenb zyrug naaig ninb Bua, “meib Bua weig haiq tiug taaib Bx'q yia Bua?” fi-li-saa-tia myenb tau, “yia Bua taaib Dob scm-sanj, xij zruj pun ninb Navq ninb zruj pun yia Bua nx.”

11.18: “+‘Ga'haaq ninb Bua yavb teib puvb Waav, wivg e-Dom Zauj mo-apg teib puv, yavb mo-apg Eei tov puv Jiaj, lyepg Zyavq yem aan-non Daaib Eei pa'q puv mcvj. mq paag ninb Bua maiq pia'g mo-apg teig, weig zu'g aan-non Daaib penj mo-apg Eei kapg Jaaij.
11.8: ki-le-aatg Eei myenb koj kxvq Buaj yepq-Taa, “ib zang yia Bua taaib lxd meib, xij meib Zauj yia Bua mivb Bx'q am-mon myenb, yaag zruj yia Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq, kunq yem ki-le-aatg teig Eei yetg zuvq pc'g fivj.”
11.33: yepq-Taa yem aa-lo-e zivb taij Jyenq am-mon myenb mivb Tauj min-nitq muvq ka'Len, zuvq mivb Tauj aa-Ben-Ke-laa-mim Bx'q paaig Eig zyepg nxm zivb. myenb Zamq haig zu'g taij taig. am-mon myenb zyrug swei i-saa-laa-en myenb.
11.3: yepq-Taa zyrug pyauj ninb Eei muab txig, mivb yem Topq teib puv. maaib teij kwavb kwrnj myenb mivb Zauj yepq-Taa zruj txig, Zauj ninb pia'g pia'g Zwrtg Zwrtq.
11.32: yepq-Taa zyrug Jiaj mivb Zauj am-mon myenb Bx'q Jaaj. zyruq yaag zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem ninb Eei puab Diaq.
11.21: “+‘zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, zx'q si-honj Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj Jiu pun yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei puab Diaq. aa-mo-lai myenb zyrug swei Revg mig a'q. i-saa-laa-en myenb tu'q Revg yem uaq nxm teib puv Eei aa-mo-lai myenb Eei teig.
11.35: ninb pwatg ninb Eei sia'q uaq zang, ninb zyrug petq kanb Eei lwib hruj yaag kxvq, “o aa sia'q aa'b! laaij meib, tia Eei Hruq mun haig a'q. kevb pun tia haid a'g haig, weig zu'g tia tu'q Zauj zyruq hruq liud waag yaag maiq haib Twij.”
11.40: yem naaig taaib i-saa-laa-en myenb maaib naaiq Euvg leib fivj. mrud Havj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei sia'g txn lovg pyei Nxi mivb weig ki-le-aatg myenb, yepq-Taa Eei sia'q, Raub Eyemq.
11.14: yepq-Taa cvj Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb lxd am-mon myenb Eei huvb.
11.23: “+‘Navq naaig zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, yem ninb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei uaq Daavg mcvj zung Zwrtq aa-mo-lai myenb. uaq Euvg meib xij zx'q penj meib Eei pwrng teib puv fai?
11.6: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj yepq-Taa, “Toq taaib zruj yia Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq, weig pun yia Bua haib Bx'q am-mon myenb.”
11.34: yepq-Taa zyrug Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei pyauq, mitq-paa uaq. ninb Eei sia'q nanq Jyenq lxb Rod Zavj Jyenq heij Zwrtq taaib zipq ninb. ninb se yepq-Taa Eei Du'g taub sia'q Navq. Zwrtq liud naaiq taub sia'q, ninb maiq maaib txn, yaag maiq maaib sia'q a'q.
11.2: ki-le-aatg Eei zyen auq yaag yuvd tu'q Zamb taub txn pun ninb. Ga'haaq uaq teij txn Lo taaib, ninb Bua zung yepq-Taa pyauj. ninb Bua kxvq, “meib maiq maaib pwrng Ripg yia Bua Eei tia Eei Jaab tivb, weig zu'g meib penj kanb taub msia'q txn Eei txn.”
11.36: ninb Eei sia'q kxvq Buaj ninb, “aa tia aa'b! sij kxvq tia txv Jyenq zyruq lcvd waag nx, ziuj tia lcvd Eei waag kunq zruj pun yia a'q. weig zu'g zyruq tu'q weig tia Jaauq win pun tia Eei winb wavq, am-mon myenb.”
11.20: mq paag si-honj maiq puvj Hruq i-saa-laa-en myenb yavb ninb Eei teib puv Jiaj. si-honj zyrug heug ninb Eei zwavj pc'g fivj taaib kapq zunq lyepg Zyavq yem yaa-haatq Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Bx'q Jaaj.
11.24: meib Eei zyenb, Ke-motq, Jiu haiq Euvg pun meib, meib maiq zeid lovg penj meib Eei pwrng fai? zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, yem yia Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj zung haiq taub Zwrtq, yia Bua mtaaib lovg penj yia Bua Eei pwrng.
11.28: mq paag am-mon myenb Eei huvb maiq mwavj yepq-Taa Paaiq mivb Eei myenb kxvq Eei waag.
11.7: yepq-Taa tau ki-le-aatg Eei myenb koj, “zinb Daavg meib Bua maiq zeid Rxv yia, zung yia Zwrtq yia Eei tia Eei pyauq fai? pwavb zu'g Kruq naang Eei zyavb hog meib Bua taaib lxd yia zruj haiq Euvg lcb?”
11.29: zyruq Eei sivj livb zyrug taaib yem yepq-Taa. ninb zyrug Jiaj ki-le-aatg Zauj maa-natq-sej cvj Jiaj ki-le-aatg teig Eei mitq-paa zivb. ninb yem ki-le-aatg teig Eei mitq-paa Jiaj mivb Tauj am-mon myenb yem Eei txvj.
11.19: “+‘i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb hetq-Bon zivb lxd aa-mo-lai myenb Eei si-honj huvb kxvq Buaj ninb, “Toq pun yia Bua yavb meib Eei teib puv Jiaj, weig mivb yia Bua kanb Eei teib puv.”
11.17: i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb Buaj e-Dom Eei huvb tiaj, “Toq pun yia Bua yavb meib Eei teib puv Jiaj og.” mq paag e-Dom Eei huvb maiq mwavj. ninb Bua cvj fib Navq Eei pun myenb mivb Toq mo-apg Eei huvb tiaj mq paag ninb yaag maiq Gxi Rwib. Navq naaig i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug tivb Fiag yem Kaa-Detg.
11.38: yepq-Taa kxvq, “kunq mivb maa'b!” ninb zyrug Gxi Rwib pun ninb Eei sia'q mivb i Laaj Eia'g. yepq-Taa Eei sia'q zyrug mivb mig a'q. ninb Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei sia'g txnb txig mivb uaq Bov Raub Eyemq weig ninb yetg liud maiq tu'q txv Jaa.
11.31: yia Bx'q hivb am-mon myenb Rwrnj Tauj yia Eei pyauq uaq zang, haiq taub yem yia Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Zwrtq taaib zipq yia Daavg Jiaj, yia lcvd zx'q uaq taub penj zyruq Eei pwrng. yia yaag xij zx'q ninb fovg hxg zruj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq.”
11.30: yepq-Taa hruq waag pun zyruq. ninb kxvq, “sij kxvq meib zx'q am-mon myenb Jiu pun yem yia Eei puab Diaq nx,
11.27: Navq naaiq, yia maiq zruj txvg meib, meib zruj txvg yia weig zu'g meib Zauj yia Bx'q Jaaj. Toq syemq zwid Eei zyruq ib Nxi yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj am-mon myenb Bu'Dovj tunj sig.’+”
11.11: yepq-Taa zyrug Zauj Jyenq ki-le-aatg Eei myenb koj Rwrnj. pc'g fivj xn yepq-Taa zruj pyeiq zeiq, yaag zruj tomb Jyen kunq ninb Bua. yepq-Taa yem uaq mitq-paa muvq txv Jyenq zyruq kxvq ninb lcvd Eei yetg zuvq waag.
11.5: uaq zang ki-le-aatg myenb Eei myenb koj mivb Topq teib puv xij txb yepq-Taa Rwrnj taaib.
11.9: yepq-Taa zyrug kxvq Buaj ki-le-aatg Eei myenb koj, “sij kxvq yia Rwrnj mivb txb meib Bua mivb Zauj am-mon myenb Bx'q Jaaj, zyruq yaag zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem yia Eei puab Diaq nx, yia za'kevb tu'q zruj meib Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq fai?”
11.16: tovb i-saa-laa-en myenb yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq taaib uaq zang, ninb Bua yavb teib puvb Waav Jiaj mivb Tauj Kxib si'q, yaag taaib Tauj Kaa-Detg.
11.37: ninb cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Eei tia, “yia xij Toq yetg Euvg. Toq pun i Laaj Eia'g yia. sweib yia Zauj yia Eei sia'g txnb txig faauj Bovb aib txvj Raub Eyemq yia yetg liud maiq tu'q txv Jaa.”
11.39: Ga'haaq pwavq i Laaj Eia'g, ninb Rwrnj ninb Eei tia Eei pyauq. yepq-Taa zyrug zruj pun ninb Eei sia'q ziuj ninb hruq Jyenq lcvd Eei waag. uaq taub sia'q maiq pweij Jiaj mJavg txn.
11.4: Jiaj taaib, Ga'haaq am-mon myenb taaib Bx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb.
11.10: ki-le-aatg Eei myenb koj tau yepq-Taa, “zyruq Tevj Bua zruj zxvb zevj, yia Bua lcvd ei Jyenq meib kxvq Eei waag zruj Revg.”
11.22: ninb Bua Zaavq tu'q aa-mo-lai myenb Eei teib puv yem aan-non Daaib mivb Tauj yapq-Bxkg Daaib yaag yem teib puvb Waav mivb Tauj Jx-Dcn Daaib.
11.12: yepq-Taa zyrug Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb naaig am-mon myenb Eei huvb tiaj, “meib Zauj yia maaib Jiaj haiq Euvg sig meib Zivj pia'g yia Eei teib puv taaib xij Zauj yia Bua Bx'q Jaaj?”
11.15: yepq-Taa kxvq, “yepq-Taa Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘i-saa-laa-en myenb maiq tu'q Rcv mo-apg myenb fai am-mon myenb Eei teib puv.
11.13: am-mon myenb Eei huvb tiaj tau yepq-Taa Eei trug fyenj myenb, “weig zu'g i-saa-laa-en myenb yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq uaq zang, ninb Bua Rcv yia Bua Eei teib puv yem aan-non Daaib mivb Tauj yapq-Bxkg Daaib, zuvq mivb Tauj Jx-Dcn Daaib. ib zang Toq meib Bua pcvb xn Eei Twij naaiq teij Dau Rwrnj pun yia.”
11.1: ki-le-aatg myenb, yepq-Taa, zruj taub henq haig Eei pcv, mq paag ninb Eei maa se maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn. ninb Eei tia se ki-le-aatg.
11.26: i-saa-laa-en myenb yem hetq-Bon zivb Zauj weib kxmj Eei fiub laavd, yaag yem aa-lo-e zivb Zauj weib kxmj Eei fiub laavd, yaag yem aan-non Daaib Len Eei yetg zuvq zivb tu'q faamb pc'q Havj uaq teij zyavb hog ka'Euad, meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq zx'q naaiq teij Dau Rwrnj?
11.25: meib kaub lovj mo-apg Eei huvb, sipg-po Eei txn, Baa-laakq fai? ninb Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Rcv Jiaj Eei fai? ninb Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jiaj Jaaj fai?

1.18: yu-Daa myenb yaag Zaavq tu'q kaa-saa zivb, atg-Ke-lon zivb Zauj e-Ko-lon zivb, lyemb uaq teij nxmb nxm zivb weib kxmj Eei teig.
1.8: yu-Daa myenb yaag Bx'q ye-lu-saa-lem, Zaavq tu'q uaq nxm zivb mig a'q. ninb Bua lovg Ru'g Daauq taij zivb ka'Euad Eei myenb yaag puvj trud puaq zivb.
1.33: napq-Taa-li myenb yaag maiq zung Betg-se-metq Zauj Betg-aa-naatq zivb Eei myenb Zwrtq, mq paag napq-Taa-li myenb yem uaq nxm teib puv Eei pwrnb teig, Kaa-naa-an myenb Bu'Dovj. yem Betg-se-metq Zauj Betg-aa-naatq zivb Eei myenb yaag zu'g napq-Taa-li myenb aapq ninb Bua zruj kov Kruq.
1.3: yu-Daa fivj Eei myenb zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua Eei kxb yrud, si-me-on fivj Eei myenb, “Toq Zauj yia Bua mivb pia'g tivg zyavj pun yia Bua Eei teib puv, Tevj yia Bua Zauj Kaa-naa-an myenb Bx'q Jaaj. Ga'haaq yia Bua Zauj meib Bua mivb tivg zyavj pun meib Bua Eei teib puv.” si-me-on myenb zyrug Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua mivb a'q.
1.32: mq paag aa-se fivj yem pwrnb teig Eei Kaa-naa-an myenb Bu'Dovj, weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq zung Kaa-naa-an myenb Zwrtq.
1.21: mq paag Ben-yaa-min myenb maiq zung yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei ye-Butg myenb Zwrtq. weig naaiq ye-Butg myenb Zivj taaib Zauj Ben-yaa-min myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
1.35: yem he-letq Bov, ai-yaa-lon Zauj saa-an-Bin zivb Eei aa-mo-lai myenb tivg Hruq yem naaig, mq paag yo-sepq Eei zeib fun henq Jiad taaib zyrug aapq ninb Bua zruj kov Niaq.
1.14: Zwrtq kcvb uaq zang akg-saaj heug ninb Eei Goj, otg-ni-en, Tevj ninb Eei tia Toq livb teig. akg-saaj yetq Fiag lxb, Kaa-lepq naaig ninb Eei sia'q, “meib xij lovg haiq Euvg?”
1.23: yo-sepq Eei zeib fun Paaiq myenb mivb Betg-en zivb Zaaiq Jua'q. zinb Daavg naaiq nxm zivb Eei Buaj heug lutq.
1.6: aa-Do-ni-Be-sekq pyauj mq paag ninb Bua zung zaaig, zx'q taaib Va'q ninb Eei zaub Do'g Eeid Zauj puab Do'g Eeid Dutq mivb.
1.34: aa-mo-lai myenb aapq Daan myenb yem Bov, maiq pun ninb Bua Fiag Daub pcvb.
1.2: zyruq kxvq, “yu-Daa fivj xij zu'g mivb Daavg. mavg maa'b! yia zuvq zx'q uaq nxm teib puv Jiu pun yem ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq.”
1.36: aa-mo-lai myenb Eei kapg Jaaij se yavb aakg-lapq-Bim zxv Jiaj Eei txvj, yem se-e-laa faauj uaq Jiaj puv.
1.20: yu-Daa myenb ziuj mo-se Paaiq Eei waag zx'q he-Bo-lon zivb Jiu pun Kaa-lepq. Kaa-lepq zyrug zung Zwrtq aa-naakq Eei pua taub zeib fun.
1.24: Zaaiq Jua'q myenb pwatg taub mJavg txn yem uaq nxm zivb Zwrtq taaib zyrug Zauj ninb kxvq, “Toq Buaj yia Bua pia'g naaiq nxm zivb Eei Jauq, yia Bua zyrug Kxb lyenb meib.”
1.28: Ga'haaq i-saa-laa-en myenb henq Jiad taaib, ninb Bua aapq Kaa-naa-an myenb zruj kov Niaq Eei mq paag maiq zung ninb Bua Zwrtq Revg.
1.7: aa-Do-ni-Be-sekq kxvq, “maaib Jiaj Zyetq zyepg taub huvb tiaj zu'g yia Va'q ninb Bua Eei puab Do'g Eeid Zauj zaub Do'g Eeid Dutq yaag yem yia Eei tiab Diaq Raud Naavb Meib Dxtq Eang. mq paag ib zang ziuj yia zruj Eei sig, Tinb huvb winb pun yia.” ninb Bua zyrug txb aa-Do-ni-Be-sekq Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. ninb zyrug yem naaig taig mig a'q.
1.29: e-faa-im myenb maiq zung yem ke-se muvq Eei Kaa-naa-an myenb Zwrtq. Navq naaig Kaa-naa-an myenb Zxg yem Jyenq ninb Bua Bu'Dovj.
1.19: zyruq Zauj yu-Daa myenb yem. ninb Bua zyrug zung yem Bovb aiq txvj Eei myenb Zwrtq mq paag yem Daub pcvb Eei myenb ninb Bua zung maiq Zwrtq, weig zu'g uaq teij myenb maaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei Lia'g maab Zia.
1.17: yu-Daa myenb Zauj ninb Bua Eei kxb yrud, si-me-on myenb, mivb Bx'q yem sej-fatq Eei Kaa-naa-an myenb, yaag myetg Revg uaq nxm zivb. weig naaiq uaq nxm zivb Eei Buaj heug ho-maa.
1.31: aa-se myenb yaag maiq zung akg-Ko zivb Eei myenb fai sai-Dxn zivb fai akg-laapq zivb fai akg-sipq zivb fai hen-Baa zivb fai aa-fekq zivb fai le-hopg zivb Eei myenb Zwrtq.
1.30: sej-Bu-lun myenb yaag maiq zung Kitq-lon Zauj naa-haa-lon zivb Eei Kaa-naa-an myenb Zwrtq. Kaa-naa-an myenb Zxg yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj mq paag sej-Bu-lun myenb aapq Kaa-naa-an myenb zruj kov Kruq Eei.
1.27: maa-natq-sej myenb maiq tu'q zung Zwrtq Betg-saan Zauj uaq nxm zivb Eei fiub laavd Eei myenb, Taa-aa-naakq Zauj uaq nxm zivb Eei fiub laavd Eei myenb, Do-aa, ipg-le-am, me-kitg-Do Zauj uaq nxm zivb Eei fiub laavd Eei myenb, weig zu'g Kaa-naa-an myenb vcvg Jyenq yem uaq nxm teib puv.
1.11: yu-Daa myenb yem naaig Zwrtq mivb Bx'q De-Bi zivb Eei myenb. De-Bi zivb zinb Daavg heug Ki-li-yaatq-sej-fe.
1.5: yem uaq ninb Bua pwavb aa-Do-ni-Be-sekq zyrug Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj yaag Bx'q hivb Kaa-naa-an Zauj pe-litq-si myenb.
1.9: Ga'haaq yu-Daa myenb mivb Bx'q yem Bovb aiq txvj, yem ne-kepg, Zauj yem Bovb Jua'q Eei Kaa-naa-an myenb.
1.16: mo-se Eei ovb taa, Ke-nai myenb Eei zeib fun, Zauj yu-Daa myenb Zwrtq taaub lomg zivb, mivb yem yu-Daa Eei teib puvb Waav, se yem ne-kepg, nitq aa-laatq. ninb Bua zyrug yem uaq teij myenb Bu'Dovj.
1.4: yu-Daa myenb zyrug mivb Bx'q Jaaj. zyruq zx'q Kaa-naa-an myenb Zauj pe-litq-si myenb Jiu pun yem ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq. ninb Bua zyrug yem Be-sekq muvq taij yetg waang taub myenb.
1.10: yu-Daa myenb cvj mivb Bx'q yem he-Bo-lon zivb Eei Kaa-naa-an myenb. zinb Daavg he-Bo-lon zivb Eei Buaj heug Ki-li-yaatq-aan-Baa. ninb Bua Bx'q hivb se-sai, aa-hi-maan Zauj Tan-mai.
1.22: yo-sepq Eei zeib fun yaag mivb Bx'q Betg-en zivb. zyruq yaag Zauj ninb Bua yem.
1.12: Kaa-lepq kxvq, “haiq taub Bx'q tu'q Ki-li-yaatq-sej-fe zivb yaag Zaavq tu'q uaq nxm zivb nx, yia lcvd pun yia Eei sia'q, akg-saaj, ninb lovg zruj auq.”
1.15: ninb Eei sia'q tau, “Toq aa tia pun zivb Eeig yia. Toq pun uamb zivq yia, weig zu'g meib pun yia yem ne-kepg. uaq teij Dau Gaai haig.” Kaa-lepq zyrug Paaiq uaq Jiaj Eei uamb zivq Zauj uaq Diaq Eei uamb zivq pun ninb.
1.13: Kaa-lepq Eei yrud, Ke-natq Eei txn, otg-ni-en, Bx'q tu'q uaq nxm zivb. Kaa-lepq zyrug zx'q ninb Eei sia'q, akg-saaj, pun otg-ni-en lovg zruj auq.
1.1: yo-su-waa kwei seij mig a'q, Ga'haaq i-saa-laa-en myenb naaig zyruq, “yia Bua Eei haiq fivj myenb xij zu'g mivb Daavg Zauj Kaa-naa-an myenb Bx'q Jaaj?”
1.26: uaq taub myenb zyrug mivb hitq-Tai myenb Eei teib puv, yem uaq Zeij nxm zivb yaag Zwrtq Buaj heug lutq. naaiq nxm zivb Zxg Navq uaq nx heug Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
1.25: uaq taub myenb zyrug Buaj pia'g zivb Eei Jauq ninb Bua. ninb Bua zyrug lovg Ru'g Daauq taij Revg zivb ka'Euad Eei myenb, mq paag ninb Bua siaj Zwrtq uaq taub mJavg txn Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei yetg pyauq myenb Eei mcvg.

10.18: ki-le-aatg myenb Eei zwavj pyeiq zeiq, laanb Zauj laanb Zaavb laavb kxvq, “haiq taub mivb Bx'q am-mon myenb Daavg, uaq taub tu'q zruj yem ki-le-aatg teig yetg zuvq pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq a'q.”
10.3: Jiaj taaib maaib ki-le-aatg myenb, Jaa-i, zruj tomb Jyen txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Eig zyepg Eeig Havj.
10.8: uaq Havj ninb Bua zeij yaag hxig i-saa-laa-en myenb Kruq haig. zyepg petq Havj ka'Euad ninb Bua zeij yem Jx-Dcn Daaib tov puv mcvj, aa-mo-lai myenb Eei teib puv, ki-le-aatg teig Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb.
10.9: am-mon myenb yaag Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib mivb Bx'q yu-Daa myenb, Ben-yaa-min myenb, Zauj e-faa-im fivj Eei zeib fun. Navq naaig i-saa-laa-en myenb za'kevb zu'g Kruq haig a'q.
10.7: zyruq zyrug Qiaj Jiad, nrud haig i-saa-laa-en myenb, zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem fi-li-saa-tia myenb Zauj am-mon myenb Eei puab Diaq.
10.5: Jaa-i kwei seij mivb, zavj Jyenq yem Kaa-mon zivb.
10.16: i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug kwavg yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj kanb fivj myenb Eei zyenb cvj fub suj zyruq.  zyruq pwatg i-saa-laa-en myenb Dovg naaiq Kruq, Tinb huvb haid Hruq mun, tiaq maiq tu'q a'q.
10.17: zruj Lo Eei am-mon myenb heug ninb Bua Eei pcv zx'q ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king, ninb Bua zyrug mivb lyepg Zyavq yem ki-le-aatg teig. i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag kapq zunq mivb lyepg Zyavq yem mitq-paa.
10.14: meib Bua kunq mivb heug tovb meib Bua kanb kinq taaib uaq teij zyenb a'q. meib Bua zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog, heug ninb Bua Fruj meib Bua maa'b!”
10.4: ninb maaib faab zyepg taub txn keb faab zyepg taub lxb, yaag maaib faab zyepg nxm zivb yem ki-le-aatg teig. zivb Eei Buaj heug haau-wotq-Jaa-i Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
10.2: ninb zruj tomb Jyen txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Eig zyepg faam Havj liud, zyrug kwei seij mig a'q, zavj Jyenq saa-mi zivb.
10.6: ziuj zyruq mavg, i-saa-laa-en myenb cvj zruj waaig sig. ninb Bua fub suj Baa-an zyenb Zauj atg-Taa-lotq zyenb. ninb Bua yaag fub suj si-lia myenb, sai-Dxn myenb, mo-apg myenb, am-mon myenb Zauj fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei yetg zuvq zyenb. ninb Bua kwavg zyruq, maiq fub suj ninb.
10.13: mq paag meib Bua Zxg kwavg yia mivb fub suj Eiag Eei zyenb. weig naaiq, yem naaiq mivb yia zyrug maiq Fruj meib Bua a'q.
10.12: sai-Dxn myenb, aa-maa-lekq myenb Zauj maa-on myenb, zeij meib Bua uaq zang, meib Bua heug Jyenq Toq yia Tevj, yia yaag Tevj meib Bua pyauj Dutq ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq maiq zeid?
10.15: i-saa-laa-en myenb tau zyruq, “yia Bua yetg zuvq paamd zwid. ziuj meib pwatg hxpg Navq haiq nx zruj, kunq zruj pun yia Bua a'q. mq paag Toq meib ib Nxi Fruj yia Bua.”
10.11: zyruq kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, “yia maiq zeid Fruj meib Bua pyauj Dutq i-yipq myenb, aa-mo-lai myenb, am-mon myenb Zauj fi-li-saa-tia myenb Eei puab Diaq fai?
10.1: aa-Bi-me-lekq kwei seij liud, Ga'haaq maaib itg-saaj-Kaa fivj, Do-Do Eei fun, Pu-aa Eei txn, To-laa, Jiad taaib Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb. ninb yem e-faa-im Bovb aiq txvj Eei saa-mi zivb.
10.10: i-saa-laa-en myenb zyrug heug Jyenq Jrub zyruq. ninb Bua kxvq, “yia Bua paamd zwid txvg meib, weig zu'g yia Bua kwavg yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, mivb fub suj Baa-an zyenb.”
